property.name: dfs.namenode.name.dir
property.description: Determines where on the local filesystem the DFS name node should store the name table.If this is a comma-delimited list of directories,then name table is replicated in all of the directories,for redundancy.

property.name: dfs.namenode.data.dir
property.description: Determines where on the local filesystem an DFS data node should store its blocks.If this is a comma-delimited list of directories,then data will be stored in all named directories,typically on different devices.Directories that do not exist are ignored.

property.name: dfs.replication
property.description: By default: 3. it > the number of noes in cluster, errors will be reported
